original_text: When he has everything that he wants, trouble suddenly comes to him. When he has everything that he wants, trouble suddenly comes to him. When he has everything that he wants,
korean_text: 풍족할 때에도 괴로움이 이르리니 모든 재난을 주는 자의 손이 그에게 임하리라

sentences.original_text: When he has everything that he wants
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 원하는 모든 것을 가질 때
